quote: Every time we launch a feature, people yell at us..

quote: Be really picky with your hiring, and hire the absolute best people you possibly can. People are the most important component of almost every business, and attracting the best talent possible is going to make a huge difference.
author: Peter Berg, Founder October Three

quote: Don't guess. Measure..
author: Slava Akhmechet, Co-founder RethinkDB

quote: The best new ideas live at the boundary between the real world and software.
author: Adam MacBeth, hardware specialist, shaped the iPod and Jawbone's wristbands

quote: If you're doing things right, something will always be a little bit broken. Most importantly, tell everybody that a little bit of chaos is okay.
author: Aditya Agarwal, VP of Engineering at Dropbox

quote: It is necessary for you to learn from others' mistakes. You will not live long enough to make them all yourself.
author: Hyman G. Rickover

quote: To create a memorable design you need to start with a thought that's worth remembering.
author: Thomas Manss

quote: Worry about being better; bigger will take care of itself. Think one customer at a time and take care of each one the best way you can.
author: Gary Comer, founder of Land's End

quote: If you're hiring the 400th employee, you would still want that person to be in your original 10. There's no reason you ever have to relax your standards. People do because of the need for speed and the need for growth, but you don't have to if you put the right processes in place..
author: Aaron Levie, Box.net

quote: A person's success in life can be measured by the number of uncomfortable conversations he or she is willing to have..
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: I know it's stressful being a CEO, but you have to celebrate with your team. Set goals earlier on that you can hit to build the team's confidence in their ability to achieve them and your ability to properly set them.
author: Wiley Cerilli, SinglePlatform Founder; CEO

quote: If you make customers unhappy in the physical world, they might each tell 6 friends. If you make customers unhappy on the Internet, they can each tell 6,000 friends..
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: A lot of the best tech startups are ideas that have been around for years but the time is finally right.
author: Chris Dixon

quote: You have a viable business only if your product is either better or cheaper than the alternatives. If it's not one or the other, you might make some money at first, but it's not a sustainable business.
author: Jim Koch, Founder of Boston Beer Co.

quote: Your organization is no better than the team you put in place around you. It all comes down to the quality of your people..
author: John Mackey, Founder Whole Foods

quote: Be maniacally focused on your customers.
author: Jon Beekman, CEO of Man Crates

quote: I'd rather spend money on things that improve the customer experience than on marketing. We run the warehouse 24-7â€“it's not very cheap or efficient, but it allows us to get the shoes out more quickly. We have a 365-day return policy with free shipping both ways..
author: Tony Hsieh, Zappos

quote: Marketing is enthusiasm transferred to the customer..
author: Gregory Ciotti, Content  Help Scout

quote: I fail probably once a week, maybe even once a day, I just think of them as mistakes, not failures. Most people see the word failure and think unrecoverable. Instead, I see failures as mini test results. I tried something, it didn't work, so let's gather up what we learned and try again
author: Jim Belosic, CEO of ShortStack

quote: One key to entrepreneurial success is to get a great group of people around you who believe in your idea
author: Richard Branson

quote: Make something people want includes making a company that people want to work for..
author: Sahil Lavingia, CEO gumroad

quote: Back up your position with data. You don't win arguments by saying, 'I think.' You win by saying, 'Let me show you..
author: Jonathan Rosenberg, Product  Google

quote: Hiring bad eggs can impact your ability to hire top talent in the future..
author: Greg Brockman, Stripe CTO

quote: Mistakes will not end your business. If you are nimble and willing to listen to constructive criticism you can excel by learning and evolving.
author: Meridith Valiando Rojas, co-founder and CEO DigiTour Media

quote: Everything around you that you call life was made up by people that were no smarter than you and you can change it, you can influence it, you can build your own things that other people can use..
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Take your time to think through something and when you're ready, act fast.
author: Matt Galligan, CEO and co-founder of Circa

quote: Great people attract great people. The quality of your team can play a big role in employee happiness.
author: David Niu, TINYpulse founder and CEO.

quote: No Plan Survives First Contact With Customers.
author: Steve Blank

quote: The worst decision is indecision.
author: Ryan Harwood, CEO of PureWow

quote: Everyone talks about building a relationship with your customer. I think you build one with your employees first..
author: Angela Ahrendts

quote: Great teams are the difference between quitting and deciding to go to bat one more time.
author: Cap Watkins, Sr. Product Design Manager at Etsy

quote: Don't burn out. Take care of yourself by getting 8 hours of sleep, eat healthy, and exercise. If you don't take care of yourself, there's no way you can take care of your company in the long-term.
author: Jared Kim,Founder; CEO of Forge

quote: The product that wins is the one that bridges customers to the future, not the one that requires a giant leap..
author: Aaron Levie, Box.net

quote: Start before you feel ready..
author: Lauris Liberts, Draugiem Group

quote: Work like there is someone working twenty-four hours a day to take it all away from you..
author: Mark Cuban

quote: Sometimes things are the way they are and can't be changed, other times it's because no one ever tried. Your job is to find the latter..
author: Aaron Levie, Box.net

quote: You need space to try things and create. It takes a long time to recalibrate if you let people pull at you all the time. A lot of stress comes from reacting to stuff. You have to keep a certain guard [up], if you're a creative person.
author: Pete Cashmore (Founder Of Mashable)

quote: Unless you are a fortune-teller, long-term business planning is a fantasy.
author: Jason Fried, Basecamp

quote: If you can do something to get somebody excited, not everybody, but if you can be the best for somebody, then you can win..
author: Ron Shaich, Panera Bread founder and CEO

quote: The only two people who can give you real feedback about your product are people who just purchased it and people who have just canceled.
author: Jason Fried

quote: My biggest motivation? Just to keep challenging myself. I see life almost like one long University education that I never had. Everyday I'm learning something new.
author: Richard Branson

quote: Fearlessness is a muscle. The more I exercise it, the less my fears run me.
author: Ariana Huffington.

quote: As an entrepreneur, you have to be OK with failure. If you're not failing, you're likely not pushing yourself hard enough. Alexa von Tobel, LearnVest
Every successful entrepreneur was first an amateur..
author: Lauris Liberts, Draugiem Group

quote: The natural state of a start-up is to die; most start-ups require multiple miracles in their early days to escape this fate..
author: Sam Altman

quote: Sell. Don't apologize for it and don't be afraid to beg with a positive, upbeat attitude. Tell prospects you want their business and you will kick ass once you've earned it. Have no shame, pride doesn't pay the rent
author: Tom Gimbel

quote: A good job isn't something you go out and find, it's something you discover while you're working.
author: Jack Ma

quote: The ability to write well is one of the most important skills we look for when hiring anyone in a product role.
Without data you're just another person with an opinion.
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: It's not about being the first to market; it's about being the first to get it right.
author: Benny Xian

quote: You'll learn more in a day talking to customers than a week of brainstorming, a month of watching competitors, or a year of market research..
author: Aaron Levie

quote: The Cost of Being Wrong is Less Than the Cost of Doing Nothing
author: Seth Godin

quote: If someone offers you an amazing opportunity and you're not sure you can do it, say yes. Then learn how to do it later..
author: Richard Branson

quote: Ideas are considered generally bad for two very different reasons: (1) so uncommon no one gets it or (2) so common, seems redundant..
author: Zaid Farooqui

quote: The strategy is to first know what you don't know, the tactic is to grind, and the value is to remember: there are plenty of places to innovate.
author: David Friedberg, Founder  Weatherbill

quote: One thing I tell startups all the time is that the best way to grow is to make their product better..
author: Sam Altman, Y Combinator

quote: Bad shit is coming. It always is in a startup. The odds of getting from launch to liquidity without some kind of disaster happening are one in a thousand. So don't get demoralized..
author: Paul Graham, Y Combinator

quote: If a picture is worth 1000 words, a prototype is worth 1000 meetings.
author: saying at ideo

quote: Get the customers first, then build tech. Not the other way around..
author: Lauris Liberts, Draugiem Group

quote: Don't be a lone wolf. Lean on the experience and smarts of your teammates, investors, and mentors to help solve the tough problems and take advantage of the opportunities. SETH BANNON, Amicus
Much more commonly you launch something, and no one cares. Don't assume when this happens that you've failed. That's normal for startups. But don't sit around doing nothing. Iterate..
author: Paul Graham, Y Combinator

quote: Pay attention to financial operations from the early days. Make a budget. Seth Bannon, Amicus
There is no sport as competitive as business. It's 24 by 7 by 365 by forever..
author: Mark Cuban

quote: The man who makes no mistakes does not usually make anything.
author: Edward Phelps

quote: Scaling is only difficult when you grow your organization like a tower instead of a city..
author: Jurgen Appelo

quote: Nearly every company goes through life-threatening momentsâ€¦ it's so common that there is an acronym for it, WFIO, which stands for 'We're Fucked, It's Over.'.
author: Ben Horowitz

quote: Starting a business is like riding a wave between life and death. If you can hang on long enough, you're bound to succeed
author: Sam Altman, Y Combinator

quote: Know your core competencies and focus on being great at them. Pay up for people in your core competencies. Get the best. Outside the core competencies, hire people that fit your culture but aren't as expensive to pay..
author: Mark Cuban

quote: Be really simple and don't stress out about things. A lot of crap happens. You can't make a stressful situation more stressful..
author: Adora Cheung, Homejoy

quote: Survival is a growth strategy.
author: Ian Hogarth, Songkick

quote: Ignore luck. Just work really hard..
author: Adora Cheung, Homejoy

quote: You're either making a market or disrupting a market. Entering a market is usually the wrong way to go..
author: Brian Halligan, CEO  HubSpot

quote: Eventually, after a couple of years, Stripe started to become an overnight success.
author: Patrick Collison, Stripe

quote: Start out by making 100 users really happy, rather than a lot more users only a little happy..
author: Paul Buchheit

quote: Data beats emotions.
author: Sean Rad, Founder, Ad.ly

quote: Keep our competitors focused on us, while we stay focused on the customer
author: Jeff Bezos, CEO Amazon.com

quote: A lot of ideas are going to fail. And that's ok..
author: Lauris Liberts, Draugiem Group

quote: Pushing that last 5% harder than your competitor is so often the difference between success and failure.
Go and make interesting mistakes, make amazing mistakes, make glorious and fantastic mistakes. Break rules. Leave the world more interesting for your being here.
author: Neil Gaiman, Make Good Art

quote: Growth solves (nearly) all problems.
author: Sam Altman, Y Combinator

quote: If there's something you want to build, but the tech isn't there yet, just find the closest possible way to make it happen..
author: Dennis Crowley

quote: Never compromise user trust for user growth..
author: Micah Baldwin, Blurb.

quote: The only way to avoid disruption is to constantly do what you would if you were just starting out..
author: Aaron Levie, Box.net

quote: Keep salaries low and equity high. Keep the organization as flat as you can
author: Sam Altman

quote: It takes 20 years to build a reputation and five minutes to ruin it. If you think about that, you'll do things differently.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Cold calling is something that's pretty critical, and something you can't be afraid to do if you're dealing with customers. You have to do it to understand what your customers want.
author: David Friedberg, Founder  Weatherbill

quote: Sometimes the best way to get your eggs from point A to point B is to put them all in one basket and take really good care of that basket.
A user interface is a joke. If you have to explain it, it's not that good.
Product comes first. Selling a product everyone wants is easy and rewarding. Selling a product no one wants is an unpleasant game of numbers..
author: Slava Akhmechet, Co-founder RethinkDB

quote: 429 of the original Fortune 500 companies (1955) are no longer is business today. Adapt or die.
Innovation is the only sustainable competitive advantage a company can have..
author: David Friedberg, Founder  Weatherbill

quote: Don't build something that already exists. Customers won't buy it just because it's yours..
author: Slava Akhmechet, Co-founder RethinkDB

quote: One of the huge mistakes people make is that they try to force an interest on themselves. You don't choose your passions; your passions choose you.
author: Jeff Bezos, Amazon

quote: Product comes first. If people love your product, the tiniest announcements will get attention. If people don't love your product, no amount of marketing effort will help..
author: Slava Akhmechet, Co-founder RethinkDB

quote: We also get thousands of suggestions. The default answer is always no.
author: Jason Fried

quote: My takeaway from this has been to always double check to make sure you're not designing toward your own biases instead of what's best for your product and users.
author: Cap Watkins, Design Lead at Etsy. Formerly at Amazon, Formspring and Zoosk.

quote: Customer service shouldn't be just a department; it should be the entire company
author: Tony Hsieh

quote: You don't need to have a 100-person company to develop that idea..
author: Larry Page

quote: Don't wait for the right moment to start the business. It never arrives. Start whenever. Now..
author: Lauris Liberts

quote: Start where you are.Use what you have.Do what you can
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: We're enamored with the concept that there's always a price. But sometimes, your goal is to build a great company, not sell it...
author: Aaron Levie, Box.net

quote: Have empathy, gratitude and respect for every position in the company.
author: Kat Cole, Cinnabon President

quote: No growth hack, brilliant marketing idea, or sales team can save you long term if you don't have a sufficiently good product..
author: Sam Altman

quote: The only time you don't fail is the last time you try something and it actually works.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: Deciding what not to do is as important as deciding what to do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough..
author: Elon Musk

quote: When you've got 10,000 people trying to do the same thing, why would you want to be number 10,0001?
author: Mark Cuban

quote: Do not tolerate brilliant jerks. The cost to teamwork is too high..
author: Reed Hastings, CEO Netflix

quote: Don't assume your customers are as knowledgeable as you are..
author: Bryan Eisenberg

quote: If we want users to like our software we should design it to behave like a likable person: respectful, generous and helpful..
author: Alan Cooper

quote: Whenever you get stuck, go meet with your customers..
author: Joe Zadeh, Product  Airbnb

quote: The secret to being wrong isn't to avoid being wrong. The secret is being willing to be wrong. The secret is realizing that wrong isn't fatal..
author: Seth Godin

quote: Any product that needs a manual to work is broken..
author: Elon Musk

quote: Never underestimate the power of someone with a mobile device who's currently being pissed off by your business.
author: Peter Shankman

quote: You can create value with breakthrough innovation, incremental refinement, or complex coordination. Great companies often do two of these. The very best companies do all three..
author: Sam Altman

quote: Embrace what you don't know, especially in the beginning, because what you don't know can become your greatest asset.
author: Sara Blakely, Spanx Founder

quote: Fire the committee. No great website in history has been conceived of by more than three people..
author: Seth Godin

quote: I try not to make any decisions that I'm not excited about.
author: Jake Nickell, Threadless founder/CEO

quote: When you are building something revolutionary, you may look delusional to those around you..
author: Lauris Liberts, Draugiem Group

quote: If you do build a great experience, customers tell each other about that. Word of mouth is very powerful.
author: Jeff Bezos, Amazon

quote: If something is important enough, even if the odds are against you, you should still do it..
author: Elon Musk, Tesla; SpaceX Founder

quote: If you're not working on your best idea right now, you're doing it wrong..
author: David Heinemeier Hansson, Basecamp

quote: Everyone starting a startup for the first time is scared, and everyone feels like a bit of an imposter..
author: Sam Altman

quote: A startup is a company that is confused about. 1. What its product is, 2. Who its customers are. 3. How to make money.
author: Dave McClure

quote: I have never in my life learned anything from any man who agreed with me..
author: Dudley Field Malone

quote: Entrepreneur is just French for 'has ideas, does them'.
author: Alexis Ohanian, Reddit Founder

quote: Hard work is always the difference between opportunities
author: Eric Rewitzer, Co-Owner of 3Fish Studios

quote: What you leave out is just as important as what you leave in.
The risk is not in doing something that feels risky. The risk is in not doing something that feels risky.
author: Andy Dunn, Bonobos Founder

quote: It's not about the amount of wealth you can accumulate, it's about the impact and change you can create.
author: Neil Blumenthal, Warby Parker Founder and Co-CEO

quote: Find your one thing and do that one thing better than anyone else.
author: Jason Goldberg, Fab Founder

quote: Most of entrepreneurship is differentiating between good-sounding dumb ideas and dumb-sounding good ideas..
author: Aaron Gotwalt

quote: Find the most talented person in the room and if it's not you, go stand next to him. Hang out with him. try to be helpful
author: Harold Ramis

quote: Don't be a complainer; make things better, let it go, or take action to make it better.
author: Tina Roth Eisenberg, Tattly Founder

quote: Chase the vision, not the money, the money will end up following you.
author: Tony Hsieh, Zappos CEO

quote: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
author: Henry Ford

quote: We will hire someone with less experience, less education, and less expertise, than someone who has more of those things and has a rotten attitude. Because we can train people. We can teach people how to lead. We can teach people how to provide customer service. But we can't change their DNA.
author: Herb Kelleher, co-founder of Southwest Airlines

quote: Start your business by doing every job yourself. It's the only way to learn what you need and who will then be best able to do it for you..
author: Danielle Newnham, Mad Men of Mobile

quote: You must be very patient, very persistent. The world isn't going to shower gold coins on you just because you have a good idea. You're going to have to work like crazy to bring that idea to the attention of people. They're not going to buy it unless they know about it.
author: Herb Kelleher, Co-founder of Southwest Airlines

quote: Founder of Shazam on entrepreneurial success: The number one determinant of entrepreneurial success is persistence. If you are not prepared to go to superhuman levels that are beyond rationality to realize your dream, then your chance of finding success is virtually zero.
Your brand is what other people say about you when you're not in the room.
author: Jeff Bezos, Amazon

quote: Even if you don't have the perfect idea to begin with, you can likely adapt.
author: Victoria Ransom, Co-founder, Wildfire Interactive

quote: Most people work at keeping their job, rather than doing a good job. If you're the former, you're leading a meaningless life. If you're the latter, keep up the good work..
author: George Lois

quote: You know, one of the things that really hurt Apple was after I left John Sculley got a very serious disease. It's the disease of thinking that a really great idea is 90% of the work. And if you just tell all these other people here's this great idea, then of course they can go off and make it happen.
Reduce. Do as little as possible to get what you have to get done
author: Joshua Schachter, Delicious

quote: Choose co-founders the way you would choose a spouse. The reality is that you will, at least in the early days, spend far more time with your co-founders than your partner..
author: Danielle Newnham

quote: It is easier to recognize other people's mistakes than our own. Always ask for feedback.
The biggest failure you can have in life is making the mistake of never trying at all.

Hire the best people you can find. This was kind of easy in the early days of foursquare. We hired our friends who were really passionate about the stuff they were building. We have a superstar team not just because their resumes are so strong, but because they've been passionate, thinking about and tinkering in this space forever. Those are the people you want to surround yourself with..
author: Dennis Crowley, Foursquare

quote: You can have brilliant ideas, but if you can't get them across, your ideas won't get you anywhere..
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: Share results(financial and key metrics)with the company every month..
author: Sam Altman

quote: The only barrier to entry you can create is to consistently build a great product..
author: Aaron Levie

quote: Don't let people tell you your ideas won't work. If you're passionate about an idea that's stuck in your head, find a way to build it so you can prove to yourself that it doesn't work..
author: Dennis Crowley, Foursquare

quote: Companies need to have a lot more flexibility with their peopleâ€¦ . If somebody wants to golf around the world for two months, okay, well, maybe on an unpaid basis, let them do it. That sort of flexibility I think is incredibly important because most of our time, we spend at work..
author: Richard Branson

quote: A startup without a full-time designer is like having a restaurant without kitchen and ordering out for customers..
author: Kerem Suer

quote: The best marketing trick: make an awesome product that does something people really care about..
author: Ryan Singer, 37signals

quote: How to make terrible software:
The customer isn't always right. But if you don't listen to them, your product won't be either.
author: Oli Gardner, Co-founder of Unbounce

quote: As your audience grows, the chance of any given action triggering criticism asymptotically approaches 100%
author: Allen Pike

quote: It takes time, it's a grind. There are no shortcuts. You've got to grind and grind.
Be narrow. It's much better to mean a great deal to a few people. Then next to nothing to a huge amount..
author: David Hieatt is the Founder of Hiut Denim

quote: Just put something out there. It will be imperfect. The real work is in figuring out how to make it better.
author: jessicajackley

quote: Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away..
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: There's nothing wrong with staying small. You can do big things with a small team.
author: Jason Fried, 37signals founder

quote: Whenever I see people doing something the way it's always been done, the way it's 'supposed' to be done, following the same old trend, well, that's just a big red flag to me to go look somewhere else..
author: Mark Cuban

quote: I try to learn from the past,but I plan for the future by focusing exclusively on the present. That's where the fun is
author: Donald Trump

quote: A good designer finds an elegant way to put everything you need on a page. A great designer convinces you half that shit is unnecessary..
author: Mike Monteiro

quote: Don't forget that if slowness is a bug, then speed is absolutely a feature..
author: Eric Feng,Flipboard. Previously Founder of Erly, Partner at Kleiner Perkins, Founding CTO of Hulu, Microsoft Research alum.

quote: Listen to the experts. Avoid too many cooks in the kitchen.
Pick an idea that you would be keen to be doing in ten years, listen to early customers, and form an amazing team..
author: Andrew Hyde, Startup Weekend

quote: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If you are busy making everything, how can you perfect anything?.
author: Apple commercial.

quote: Don't worry about failure; you only have to be right once.
author: Drew Houston, Dropbox founder and CEO

quote: An entrepreneur isn't someone who owns a business, it's someone who makes things happen.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Be more tolerant of the difficult people. They're the creative ones. They're not happy with the status quo.
author: Terry Leahy, former CEO of Tesco

quote: I'd say most startups fail because the founders and teams don't learn and pivot fast enough from what doesn't work..
author: Andrew Hyde, Startup Weekend

quote: Success is never getting to the bottom of your to-do list..
author: Marissa Mayer, Yahoo

quote: Move fast. Speed is one of your main advantages over large companies..
author: Sam Altman.

quote: Almost everything important is at first opposed by stakeholders in the status quo. Be relentless, persistent and tenacious..
author: Steve Blank

quote: You cannot mandate productivity, you must provide the tools to let people become their best..
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Don't play games that you don't understand, even if you see lots of other people making money from them
author: Tony Hsieh

quote: Minimalism is not a lack of something. It's simply the perfect amount of something..
author: Nicholas Burroughs

quote: My favorite business book of all time is experience..
author: Noah Kagan, App Sumo

quote: Care about your customers more than about yourself, and you'll do well.
author: Derek Sivers

quote: Quality is more important than quantity. One home run is much better than two doubles.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: A great product manager has the brain of an engineer, the heart of a designer, and the speech of a diplomat. Deep Nishar, UX at LinkedIn. deepnishar
For every new feature we add, we take an old one out. A lot of big sites don't do that, and it's a problem.
author: David Karp, Founder of Tumblr

quote: The most important thing is that you actually care, that you do something to the very best of your ability
author: Jony Ive, Apple

quote: The hard part is what separates good from great..
author: Noah Kagan, AppSumo

quote: Tip: Take the stodgiest, oldest, slowest moving industry you can find. And build amazing software for it..
author: Aaron Levie, Box.net

quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do
author: Steve Jobs

quote: No man will make a great leader who wants to do it all himself or get all the credit for doing it..
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: If everything seems under control you're just not going fast enough..
author: Mario Andretti

quote: If you never want to be criticized, for goodness' sake don't do anything new.
author: Jeff Bezos, Amazon

quote: Content marketers out there can relate? The first draft of anything is shit.
author: Ernest Hemingway.

quote: Sleep is that time you're working on startup problems with your eyes closed..
author: Dharmesh Shah Founder and CTO at HubSpot

quote: Be a yardstick of quality. Some people aren't used to an environment where excellence is expected.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Any business plan won't survive its first encounter with reality. The reality will always be different. It will never be the plan.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Do, or do not. There is no try..
author: Yoda

quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it comes dressed in overall and looks like hard work..
author: Thomas Edison

quote: If you decide that you're going to do only the things you know are going to work,you're going to leave a lot of opportunity on the table..
author: Jeff Bezos, Amazon

quote: You can't just ask customers what they want and then try to give that to them. By the time you get it built, they'll want something new..
author: Steve Jobs

quote: There is only one boss. The customer. And he can fire everybody in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money somewhere else..
author: Sam Walton, Founder Wal-Mart

quote: In business by the time you realize you're in trouble, it's too late to save yourself.Unless you're running scared all the time,you're gone..
author: Bill Gates

quote: Minimize complexity. The simpler the product, the more likely you are to actually ship it, and the more likely you to fix problems quickly..
author: Slave Akhmechet

quote: You can't be that kid standing at the top of the waterslide, overthinking it. You have to go down the chute.
author: Tina Fey

quote: The chance of failure is almost always better than the guarantee of never knowing..
author: Aaron Levie, Box.net

quote: If you do something and it turns out pretty good, then you should go do something else wonderful, not dwell on it for too long. Just figure out what's next..
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Nothing influences people more than a recommendation from a trusted friend..
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: Metrics are for doing, not for staring. Never measure just because you can. Measure to learn. Measure to fix.
author: Stijn Debrouwere

quote: Creative process: 1) This is going to be awesome 2) This is hard 3) This is terrible 4) I'm terrible 5) Hey, not bad 6) That was awesome.
It helps not to call people human resources. They're people. And, as it turns out, people like to be treated like people. Go figure..
author: Dharmesh Shah, Founder and CTO at HubSpot

quote: At the end of the day, you can decide whether you want to be an employee with a great attendance record, getting promoted to ever better titles and working on interesting projects, or whether you want to attempt to do something spectacular. Or this be or do should be a question you never stop asking yourself for the next 20 years, and beyond..
author: Steve Blank

quote: The great thing about taking the big chance when you're younger is you have less to lose and you don't know as much.So you take big swings..
author: Amy Poehler

quote: Quality is the best business plan..
author: John Lasseter, Pixar Chief Creative Officer

quote: You know you've done something right when everyone else at the conference table is smarter than you.
author: Chuck Gordon, SpareFoot

quote: True innovation is coming up with a product that the customer didn't even know they needed.
